question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_set_configs_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Validity Window Exploit] Can attacker manipulate oracle_validity_length_ms to create time windows where stale manipulated prices remain valid during high-impact vault operations (withdrawals, liquidations)?
